'''Song Of The Lonely Mountain''' is a song, written by [[Howard Shore]] and performed by [[Neil Finn]], that features in the end credits of ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]''. It is also the twelfth track of the second disc of both ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' and ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition]]'' (in an extended form).
==Lyrics==
{{Blockquote
Leave us standing upon the heights
What was before, we see once more
Our [[Kingdom under the Mountain
Fiery mountain beneath the [[moon]]
The words unspoken, we'll be there soon

And all who find us will know the tune
Some folk we never forget
Some kind we never forgive
Haven't seen the back of us yet
We'll fight as long as we live
All eyes on the hidden door
To the [[Lonely Mountain]] borne
We'll ride in the gathering storm

From long ago when lanterns burned

Some folk we never forget

Haven't seen the end of it yet

All eyes on the hidden door
